import React from 'react'; import styles from './CurrentDay.css'; const CurrentDay = ({ forecast }) => (
{/*

{date}

*/}

{forecast.city}

Temperature

Temp:{forecast.temp}째C

Temp_min:{forecast.temp_min}째C

Temp_max:{forecast.temp_max}째C

Feels_Like:{forecast.feels_like}째C

{/*

{date}

*/}

Weather

Sunrise:{forecast.sunrise} Sunset:{forecast.sunset} Sunset:{forecast.sunset}

); export default CurrentDay;
